translations: [贸易] 旅行用品商；运动用具商；[贸易] 装饰用品商店；机器安装工

sentences.sentence: Jack Sumner was a guide and outfitter who ran a trading post in the Colorado Rockies.
sentences.translation: 杰克·萨姆纳曾作为向导兼装备店商在科罗拉多落矶经营一家商埠。

sentences.sentence: The company is also the exclusive outfitter of the Wimbledon tennis tournament, through 2010.
sentences.translation: 一直到2010年，该公司还是温布尔登网球锦标赛的唯一的运动用品供应商。

sentences.sentence: We chose to go with OARS, a well-known and respected outfitter who runs trips all over the world.
sentences.translation: 我们选择去了桨，一个众所周知的和受尊重服装提供商，谁经营世界各地旅行。
